statements: SELECT * FROM employee_schedules WHERE id = 1;
SELECT employee_id, start_date FROM employee_schedules WHERE certification = 'Certified';
SELECT id, employee_id FROM employee_schedules WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM employee_schedules WHERE end_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, certification FROM employee_schedules WHERE employee_id = 101;
SELECT id, employee_id, start_date, end_date, certification FROM employee_schedules WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM employee_schedules WHERE start_date <= '2022-01-01' AND end_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, employee_id, certification FROM employee_schedules ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_schedules WHERE certification = 'Certified' AND start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY end_date ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_certified FROM employee_schedules WHERE certification = 'Certified';
SELECT * FROM EmployeeSchedule;
SELECT employee_id, schedule_date FROM EmployeeSchedule WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT certification_name, expiration_date FROM Certification WHERE expiration_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Certification ORDER BY certification_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeSchedule WHERE schedule_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM EmployeeSchedule ORDER BY schedule_date DESC, end_time ASC
SELECT employee_id, schedule_date, start_time, end_time FROM EmployeeSchedule WHERE employee_id = 1001
SELECT certification_name, expiration_date FROM Certification WHERE expiration_date >= '2023-01-01' ORDER BY expiration_date
SELECT certification_id, certification_name FROM Certification WHERE certification_name LIKE '%Developer%'
SELECT employee_id, MIN(start_time) AS earliest_start_time, MAX(end_time) AS latest_end_time FROM EmployeeSchedule GROUP BY employee_id
SELECT * FROM AdventureTourGuides;
SELECT guide_id, first_name, last_name FROM AdventureTourGuides ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT guide_id, certification_status FROM AdventureTourGuides WHERE certification_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeSchedules WHERE shift_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY shift_date ASC;
SELECT guide_id, certification_type FROM Certifications WHERE expiration_date < CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT * FROM AdventureTourGuides;
SELECT guide_id, first_name, last_name FROM AdventureTourGuides WHERE certification_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeSchedules ORDER BY shift_date DESC, start_time ASC;
SELECT guide_id, certification_type, expiration_date FROM Certifications WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT atg.first_name, cs.certification_type FROM AdventureTourGuides atg JOIN Certifications cs ON atg.guide_id = cs.guide_id;
SELECT * FROM AdventureTourGuides;
SELECT guide_name, guide_experience FROM AdventureTourGuides;
SELECT guide_name, guide_experience, guide_certification FROM AdventureTourGuides WHERE guide_experience > 5;
SELECT guide_name FROM AdventureTourGuides ORDER BY guide_name DESC;
SELECT guide_name, COUNT(guide_id) AS num_guides FROM AdventureTourGuides GROUP BY guide_name;
SELECT * FROM AdventureTourGuides;
SELECT guide_name, guide_experience FROM AdventureTourGuides ORDER BY guide_experience DESC;

SELECT guide_name, certification_name FROM AdventureTourGuides JOIN GuideCertifications ON AdventureTourGuides.guide_id = GuideCertifications.guide_id JOIN Certifications ON GuideCertifications.certification_id = Certifications.certification_id;

SELECT guide_name, count(certification_id) AS certification_count FROM AdventureTourGuides LEFT JOIN GuideCertifications ON AdventureTourGuides.guide_id = GuideCertifications.guide_id GROUP BY guide_name;
SELECT AVG(guide_experience) AS avg_experience, MAX(guide_experience) AS max_experience, MIN(guide_experience) AS min_experience FROM AdventureTourGuides WHERE guide_experience IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM adventure_tour_guides;
SELECT id, name, email FROM adventure_tour_guides WHERE certification_status = TRUE;
SELECT tour_name, difficulty_level FROM tours ORDER BY difficulty_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM schedules WHERE date >= '2022-08-15';
SELECT tour_guide_id, COUNT(*) AS total_assignments FROM tour_guide_assignments GROUP BY tour_guide_id ORDER BY total_assignments DESC;
SELECT * FROM adventure_tour_guides WHERE certification_status = TRUE;
SELECT id, name, email FROM adventure_tour_guides ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM schedules WHERE date >= '2022-07-01' AND date <= '2022-07-15';
SELECT tour_name, description FROM tours WHERE difficulty_level = 'Intermediate';

SELECT certifications.certification_name, certifications.expiration_date, adventure_tour_guides.name FROM certifications INNER JOIN adventure_tour_guides ON certifications.id = adventure_tour_guides.id;
